page.title: 10EDUCATION-GENERAL.
page.content: There are 7 primary schools in the East End of Greenock, 3 Roman Catholic Schools, St Kenneth's, St Lawrence's and St Mungo's and 4 non- denominational schools, Craigeknowes, Hillend, King's Glen and Lady Burn. Primary schools educate children from 4 to 12 years after which they go to secondary schools. There are no secondary schools in this area, older children travel, many by bus to schools a few miles away. There are also 3 nursery schools which cater for children from 3 to 5, 2 are attached to the primary schools, Craigeknowes and Hillend the other is called Glenbrae. Hillend also has a mother and baby clinic. There are no further education establishments catering for those over the age of 16 in the East End of Greenock.
